metadata.titel_preek: Save Us in the Time of Trial, and Deliver Us from the Evil One

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The Cosmic Battle: God's people are called to stand firm against the powers of darkness (the Evil One) until the final appearing of Christ, who has already overcome.

tekstueel_bewijs: Would I have the courage to attend worship?
We are not contending against flesh and blood...
We can offer ourselves in new and more intentional ways to stand at the battle line.

object.identificatie: Endurance / The Good Confession / Standing Firm
tekstueel_bewijs: By your endurance you will gain your lives.
To him that overcometh, the crown of life shall be.

zender.identificatie: The Lord Jesus Christ / The Apostolic Tradition
tekstueel_bewijs: Jesus seeks to prepare his disciples for the great time of testing.
I charge you to keep the commandment unstained.

ontvanger.identificatie: The World / The Kingdom of God
tekstueel_bewijs: Bear testimony to the Lordship of Christ.
Glorify our Redeemer by our actions.
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer identifies as the Subject (Soldier) called to act.

helper.identificatie: The Armor of God / The Spirit / The Promise of Christ
tekstueel_bewijs: The sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God.
The certainty of his coming again was the most powerful of all motivations.
The Lord gives us the gift of sight.
helper.rol_van_god: God is primarily the Helper (providing armor) and the Sender (giving the charge).
helper.rol_van_geest: External help (Sword/Word) and indwelling power (upholding the believer).

tegenstander.identificatie: The Evil One / Principalities and Powers / The Ruler of this World
tekstueel_bewijs: The powers of darkness will be arrayed against them.
The spiritual hosts of wickedness in the heavenly places.
The Nazi extermination of the Jews.
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not merely psychological or moral failure, but an ontological, supra-individual force of evil that requires divine intervention.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The Daily Grind: Applying the cosmic battle to mundane ethical decisions (workplace, relationships).
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Hearer
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The mundane ethical life is framed as a subset of the cosmic apocalyptic struggle.

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.helper_subject_tegenstander: Armor of God → The Christian ← The Evil One

voorbeelden_god_subject: The Lord gives us the gift of sight.
Christ Jesus who in his testimony... made the good confession.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: Would I have the strength of character?
You come faithfully to these Wednesday night services.

voorbeelden: I charge you to keep the commandment.
Sincere seeking to know and follow Jesus.
Jesus seeks to prepare his disciples.
That you may be able to withstand.
We will be upheld by the Savior.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on the 'ability' (Pouvoir) to stand, which is presented as a gift from God (Armor) rather than an inherent human capacity.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Moves from the threat of S2 (Torture/Evil) to the necessity of S1 (Endurance), while critiquing ~S2 (the 20th-century denial of evil).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is found in Christ's own 'Good Confession' and his final victory which 'obliterates' S2.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Extremely high; evil is treated as a cosmic reality, not a mistake.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While the sermon has high 'Devoir' (imperatives), it is Grace-oriented because the Subject's competence (Pouvoir) is entirely derived from God's provision (Armor) and Christ's prior victory.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: By your endurance you will gain your lives.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: The Lord gives us the gift of sight.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Corrie ten Boom and Desmond Tutu are used as models of those who 'wore the armor'.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Focus on how God sustained Corrie ten Boom rather than her own bravery.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Empowerment mixed with sobriety; the hearer is a soldier in a real war.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Synergism of the 'Third Use of the Law'—the believer acts because God has equipped them.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: Excellent integration of the cosmic (Revelation) and the personal (daily trials).
spanning_punten: The tension between 'By your endurance' (Human Subject) and 'Our Lord has overcome' (Divine Subject).

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: The evil one will be not only conquered but obliterated forever.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: Endowment through the 'Sword of the Spirit'.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Critical; evil is an active, resisting force.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon successfully avoids moralism by framing human action as 'standing' in God's armor rather than 'achieving' by human strength.

identificatie_herstel.problematische_identificatie: The hearer might feel the weight of 'endurance' as a work.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Emphasize that the 'endurance' is itself a fruit of the Spirit.

modale_balans.huidige_onbalans: Slightly heavy on Devoir (Charge to Timothy).
modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Expand on 'The Lord gives us the gift of sight' as the primary source of action.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A powerful example of apocalyptic homiletics that takes evil seriously while anchoring hope in the victory of Christ.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorical analysis would focus on the NYT anecdote; Greimas reveals the actantial shift from 'I' to 'The Evil One' as the primary opponent.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains the Synoptic Apocalypse; Greimas shows how the hearer is 'recruited' into that apocalypse.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'Armor' is the essential Helper that bridges the gap between human weakness and the Devoir of the Gospel.

volledige_subject_lijst: The powers of darkness (will be arrayed)
appendices.notities: The sermon uses the 'Rutledge Rule' effectively in the conclusion by making Christ the subject of the final victory.
